name: Kai Entity
description:
KAI ENTITY

Kai Entity is an abstract adventure in sci-fi style with a shuttle.
The sections that you can explore are different from one another and are influenced by the feelings of the star "Kai the shuttle"

When all sections are complete,you will expect a special reward.

Enjoy the fun.


FEATURE

-Gameplay = Bullet hell
-Design = Sci-fi
-Levels = 10
